choices: You take a closer look at the doll now...
1223121.content:
"This is so cool!" Your friend Ryan exclaimed as the two of you stared in awe at the comic convention your town had decided to host. Ryan had been talking about it for the past two months, and was eager to attend. Big artists and writers having booths for people to see, cool (and no doubt expensive) merchandise, and some great costumes and cosplay!

Speaking of...

"Yeah, it sure is," you agree, "I just wish I'd been able to find a cool costume..." You grumbled. Ryan just shrugged nonchalantly as he looked around the convention, eyeing booths to visit, and hot cosplayers to ogle.

"It's not that big a deal if you don't have a costume (Name). Besides," Ryan grinned, checking out a few more lovely cosplayers, "it's way more fun to look at the people in the costumes than it is to wear the costume."

"You're only saying that because most of the cosplayers here are women." You retort, boredly looking around for a booth or piece of merch that might catch your eye. But your friend didn't listen, in fact, he seemed to have found something that caught his eye, and wandered off. You hastily looked around a minute, but sighed to yourself when he didn't seem to be anywhere in sight.

Deciding that you'd either call him up, or meet back at the hotel room the two of you had rented to at the end of the day, you quickly began to explore the convention more.

After a few minutes of wandering aimlessly, enviously admiring the costumes and effort people put into making them, you found yourself at one of the less crowded areas of the convention. Most of the popular booths being closer to the entrance. A few sparsely decorated booths, with only a few handfuls of people walking around. Boredly you leaned onto one of the empty tables, eyeing some of the few costumed attendees that bothered to come to this section of the convention.

"Looking for something?"

You jumped in surprise at the sudden voice behind you, quickly turning to face the stranger. Sighing in relief at a middle aged, seemingly Asian woman sitting behind the table, a box at either side of her chair. She gave you a kind smile as you smiled back.

"Um, no. Just wishing I'd been able to find a costume." You explain sheepishly, "It looks so fun to dress up as a character you like."

The woman's smile widened at your words, before she opened one of the boxes beside her chair, sifting through the contents you couldn't exactly see.

"Well I'm sure I can help you with that!" She says cheerfully, as your smile grew. What luck!

"Wow, um, thank you!" You say, pulling out your wallet, "How much will it co-"

"Not a cent sweetie!" The woman cuts you off, handing you a small plastic sack, "I don't give these out to just anyone! Just give it a squeeze, and you'll have a perfect costume before you know it!" She explains, sitting back in her chair, her smile not once faltering.

You take your eyes off of her and into the bag, confusion over your face as you pull out what seemed to be a perfect replica of Starfire from the Teen Titans.

"Um, how will some merchandise he-" Your words stop in your throat as you look back at the woman, before noticing she was gone. Your brow raised, you look around, but there seemed to be no sign of her anywhere!

Staring down at the Starfire doll in confusion, you ponder her words.

"Just give it a squeeze, huh?" You mutter, "What a joke..."
1223121.title: Searching for a Costume

choices: Find a place to hide, this is too embarrassing!
12231211.content:
You raised a brow as you carefully turned and studied the Starfire doll in your hand, left to you by a strange woman who had strangely disappeared without a trace. It felt like something out of a cheesy kids story. But the circumstances for how you got the doll didn't detract from just how high quality it was.

"Maybe I can display it on my shelf at home." You consider to yourself, brushing your finger against the smooth plastic of the skin, admiring the feel and craftsmanship of the doll.

Suddenly you felt a nauseous feeling in your stomach. Dropping to doll to the ground as you fall to your knees, trying to keep yourself from throwing up. You fall to your side as a massive headache seemingly rips your skull in half. The sudden and hard pain you felt made the feelings and strange sensations of your body being pressed, grown, and shaped almost undetectable to you.

You clenched your eyes shut as the pain and headache slowly subsided. You slowly push yourself up off of the floor, rubbing your forehead, a small groan escaping your lips. Your whole body felt like jello, but you could faintly feel that your clothes most definitely felt way different. Slowly trying to pick yourself up off of the cold hard tile flooring of the convention center, you quickly lose balance, falling onto the table you had gotten the doll from.

Slowly, you rub your hand across your head, only for your eyes to shoot open in shock.

"What on the world?" You blurt out as your hands run through long, smooth hair, before slapping a hand over your mouth in horror. That wasn't your voice! It didn't even sound like the way you talked! It was almost like...

Glancing down at yourself, panic slowly set in as you gaped in shock at yourself. Your skin was now a fleshy orange, sizable breasts pushing out a purple top with metal plated around the neck, a very short purple skirt, with purple thigh high boots covering a very female body.

"I-I am Starfire!" You stutter panicking, jumping to your feet, wobbling to find your new center of gravity, looking over and poking a body that was now very, very unfamiliar to you. You looked, sounded and talked exactly like she did in the show!

"Why has this happened?" You ask aloud to no one in particular as you run a hand up your smooth thighs before noticing something on the ground. Almost falling over, you reach down and scoop it up.

It was a doll that was about the same size as the one the woman had given to you, only now it was no longer a piece of comic book merchandise, but an uncanny doll of you! Or at least, what you had looked like before! Right down to the clothes, hair and face!

"C-Change me back to the normal!" You plead desperately, squeezing and poking the doll over, "I like Starfire, but I do not want to be her!"

After a few minutes of desperate attempts to get the doll to switch forms with you once again, you to your knees, your new green eyes starting to water a bit. Were you trapped like this forever? How could you explain this to anyone? Would anyone even believe you?

"Hey!" You jumped at the sound, immediately standing up and turning to face one of the security guards the convention had.

"People aren't allowed back here!" The guard scolds annoyed, you stare up at the large man in shock before finding your voice.

"Um... Of course, uh, Sir!" You stammer nervously, "I have just, ah, gotten separated from my, um, friend! And I was wishing to find them, and I have, become lost! Hehe..." You nervously laugh, placing the doll that had stolen your body in the bag the woman had given you. The guard looks down at you unimpressed for a minute before sighing.

"Alright," He says, "Just get back to the rest of the convention. This section will be open tomorrow." You quickly wobble past the man and back to the crowd of people a couple hundred feet away, your face more red than orange.

You had wanted a costume for the convention, but not like this!
12231211.title: Seeing Star(fire)s!

123322211.content:
"Ugh..." you groaned as you hefted another box up. You had wanted to go spend your weekend with friends, but instead you were stuck working a shift at your local Goodwill! The worst part was that it wasn't even a mundane one like working the register. You were helping load up donations full of boxes! Having to do most of it alone added more work. You grumbled under your breath as you lifted another box inside.

Unfortunately, you couldn't exactly see where you were going.

You let out a shout as you walked into, and tripped over another box. The heavy box you carried flew out of your hands, it's contents spilling out onto the cement floor. You on the other hand, landed flat on your face.

Letting out a series of rather colorful vocabulary words, you pulled yourself back up, looking at the contents you had spilled.

It was a box full of children's toys, some looking to be some pretty rare ones too. Your interest grew as you further dug around. However, one doll in particular grabbed your attention.

You immediately recognized the long, purple hair tied in a ponytail, and the red bikini and belly dancer pants.

"I didn't know they made Shantae merch," you pondered aloud, "much less this high quality." the hair looked perfect, the clothes felt real, everything about this doll said, "this had so much care put into it." So who would just give it away? To a Goodwill no less?

You shrugged the thoughts off, deciding to pocket the doll for yourself. Your shift carried on as normal.
123322211.title: An Unusual Find

choices: Find that doll! you can't be stuck like this! Right?
1233222111.content:
After you had finished unloading boxes, you had finally been able to relax for the rest of your shift, and take your mind off of work, and that strange doll you had found. It had completely slipped your mind even!

Your shift eventually ended, and you were finally able to go home. Without a care in the world, you began to make your way home. When you arrived at home, you noticed that your parent's car wasn't in the driveway.

'They probably left a note on the counter.' You thought, as you opened the front door and walked into the house. Sure enough, you found a note from your parents, saying that they had gone to visit some friends and wouldn't be home until around 11 that night, and to fix yourself some leftovers in the fridge. You shrugged, and plopped yourself down on the couch to play a game. Being an only child, you were left to a house of peace and quiet. But as you sat, you felt something in your pocket.

Confused, you reached in and pulled out the Shantae doll you had found earlier! You looked over the doll once again, appreciating just how good it looked. Bringing the doll to your face, you stared deep into the doll's lifeless eyes, your grip tightening.

Suddendly, you felt bolts of energy shoot through you. Immediately dropping the doll and falling to the floor, you shut your eyes tight as you felt changes to your body, some parts growing, others shrinking. You black out as the pain became unbearable.

When you came to, you felt... off. Everything felt unfamiliar.

You didn't account for your higher voice as you groaned, pushing yourself up, raising a hand to rub your aching head.

"Huh?!" you gasp, eyes darting open as your hands feel not short, unkempt hair, but soft, long, smooth hair done up in a ponytail, "This isn't right! And this isn't my voice!" you say, getting weirded out. Then your eyes traveled down to your body.

Only to be greeted by sizeable, perky breasts in a red bikini!

"I'm a chick?!" you shout, feeling up your thick thighs, and smooth, brown skin, strands of purple hair fall into your vision.

Then you noticed your reflection in the TV.

"I'm Shantae?!" You shout, looking at your new form in both arrousal and horror.

Parts of you feel like they are shrinking while others seem to grow. You collapse on the carpet with a thump and everything goes black for a second.

When you recover enough to be aware of your surroundings the first thing you notice is something tight is wrapped around your chest. Further south it feels like you’ve got one hell of a wedgie only it somehow feels like whatever it is riding up in the front as well as the back. You groan and rub the back of your head where it bumped against the floor.

“What da heck!” you yelp as your hand feels long soft hair tied up in bunches “Dis ain't right at all!”

You don't even sound like yourself your words coming out in a high slightly nasal twang. You sound just like an Australian girl mimicking an American accent and the speech patterns of a cartoon character.

You stare down at your transformed body gapping at the impossible sight that greets you. You have smooth pale skin marked by tattoos. Your long slim legs are wrapped in artfully torn stockings. Twin mounds on your chest push out a t-shirt that you definitely weren't wearing a moment ago. Swallowing hard you slowly move your legs apart confirming that the colourful hot pants you are squeezed into are not concealing even the slightest trace of a bulge. In fact, if you open your legs too far they form a noticeable cameltoe.

“Holy heck," you say “I'm a girl! I'm Harley Quinn!”

The feeling of fabric pushing against your new anatomy, while not unpleasant, is too much weird to deal with right now. You press your knees back together and look around for some clue as to what has happened. You spot a doll on the floor nearby. It is about the same size as the Harley doll had been but instead of being a piece of movie merchandise it is an uncannily accurate replica of you. Or rather how you normally look, right down to the clothes you were wearing and the startled look on its face. You scoop it up hoping to reverse what has happened but nothing you try works. It looks like you are stuck this way for a while at least.

You sigh wondering what to do next. You could try and get some help, assuming anyone would believe you. Then again as a guy in a woman's body, you are in a unique situation, maybe you should take advantage of that?

You sit down on your bed, placing the doll that had stolen your form beside your large, smooth thighs. Sighing dejectedly, you look down at yourself. The tight white shirt stretched across your body, pushed out by your new breasts. You cringed at the words, “Daddy’s Little Monster” written across the front, fuck that’s so cringeworthy. You were stuck like this for a while at least, and you prayed not forever, but you couldn’t just hide in your room forever. And you definitely didn’t want your parents to see you like this.

“If dey even believed me.” You moped, “Dammit this voice is annoying.”

Then a possible solution hit you as you got to your feet, trying to ignore the motions of your new anatomy. Jason! Your best friend since First Grade! Surely he’d believe you and help!

You reached into your back pocket, a smile on your face, “I just need t-“ your smile dropped as your hand grabbed not the phone you kept in your back pocket, but grasped your large, firm, but plush ass.

It seemed that unless you wanted to explain this whole thing to your parents, you’d have to trek over to Jason’s place, and unless you wanted to face his parents, you’d have to sneak into his room, and somehow convince him that you were his best friend, and to let you stay with him for the foreseeable future.

Deciding that it was better than nothing, you grabbed the doll, walked out of your room and to the door. You bring your fingers to your butt, tugging at the tight article of clothing, trying to make it cover your ass in some fashion.

1253.content:
You sigh looking through your little sister's posts on the internet. She's been missing for a day now and the police can officially start looking for her, which you thought was bullshit because in those twenty-four hours anything could have happened to her. Your mom was beside herself with worry since it was a miracle she even got pregnant with Haley, not to mention carrying her to full term and delivering a healthy baby. As you're think by about that your phone rings and you see that it's your mom. With a little sigh you answer it with, "Hey Ma."

"Have you heard anything Rick?" she asked obviously desperate to hear that Haley was ok.

"Mom," you said with a little sigh, "I told you that I would call if I heard anything from her. You don't have to keep calling me."

"I'm just afraid that she killed herself," she said breaking down and crying.

After she calmed down a bit you said, "There's nothing that indicates she was having suicidal thoughts."

"Then why hasn't she come home and why are calls going straight to voicemail?" she asked almost shrieking.

"You know she forgot her charger at home," you said trying to sound calm to calm her down. "She probably ran her battery down listening to music which is why calls are going straight to voicemail. She also may not be in a place where she could charge her phone. She mentioned going camping in one of her posts."

"Did she say where?" she asked sounding hopeful.

"Unfortunately she didn't," you said sighing. "It may be that she hadn't decided where to go camping when she posted that and she forgot to tell you."

"I suppose you could be right," she said sighing. "You will call me if you hear anything?"

"Of course I will," you say sighing a bit. "Love you Mom."

"I love you too sweetie," she said before hanging up.

You put your phone down and lean back in your chair. It could be that Haley went camping but you were worried that she didn't tell your mom if she did. Perhaps she was just trying to assert some independence since she was sixteen. Something started tickling in the back of your mind so you sat back up and looked around. Nothing was out of the ordinary but you couldn't ignore that tickling. Letting the feeling be your guide you got up and went to the door of your apartment. You were sure that there would be someone there when you opened it but that wasn't the case. You were about to close the door when you looked down and saw a doll. This wasn't an ordinary doll though, it looked exactly like Haley right down to what she was wearing when your mom saw her last. What did this mean? Did someone have Haley and they were telling you? Was she here? It took seven hours to get from your apartment to your mom's house so it was possible.

You bent down to look at it a bit closer. You could tell that it was made from plastic which suggested it wasn't made within the last twenty-four hours. So someone had to have been watching her for a long time, that's the only way you could explain the detail you see. What about the clothes though? Maybe whoever made this doll also made copies of the clothes they've seen Haley wear. If that was the scenario then it would seem someone was obsessed with her.

You know that you shouldn't touch it but you just couldn't help picking it up. When you did strange words floated through your mind and you had the desire to say them. You weren't sure if you should though. What do you do?
1253.title: Your Little Sister?!

The doll's shoulders broadened while it's hips narrowed. It's face became more masculine, in fact it became your face as the clothes became the clothes you were wearing. Not only that but you weren't wearing your shirt anymore, you were wearing what appeared to be Haley's shirt that she wore the last time your mom saw her. Could you have become your sister? It seemed impossible that you could go from a forty-three year old man to a sixteen year old girl but that appears to be what happened. The growing urge to pee cut into your thoughts. Curious about your sister's bra size you take it off and look at the tag. "34C huh," you said blushing a bit. "Sorry about that sis but I think I'll get you a new bra to make up for this." For now you put the bra and shirt back on.

You picked up the doll and pondered what to do next. You thought about texting your mom but that didn't seem like a good idea at the moment. You didn't know how this worked so you couldn't explain what happened or if it's reversible. With that thought there were a couple of things you could do. You could either try to change back or see if there's anything on the Internet about the doll. Which will you choose?
12531.title: A Swap

choices: Cindy calls several of her 'real' girl friends over.
Cindy has a special surprise in store for Jon.
13.content:
"Oh Jon! Time to play!" Cindy called. Ah Great, not this again.

Jon ran down the hall at the speed of greased lightning, feeling like a hunted animal. He recklessly took flight up the staircase and skimmed corners the way Formula-One racers would cut around bends. All that was going through his mind was the he sure as heck wan't going to be caught by his little sister today. Not again! Not ever.

"Where are you, Jon?! Come out, come out, wherever you are! Come play with me!"

Damn! She found him! Jon felt like a trapped hare as he searched for options, for places to hide in the second story of their home. He could hear Cindy coming up the staircase. Her steps, although as like in finesses as the 13-year old girl that she was, sounded as ominous as that of a movie serial killer going in for the last stages of the kill.

"You can run, but you can't hide, Jon. I'm coming for you!"

Oh yeah? I can't hide? Jon thought. Then let's see you find me now! He squinted around this bedroom (it was his parent's) he had unknowingly trapped himself in his haste to get as far away from his sister as distance would allow, and spotted several opportunities for escape in the form of camouflage and hiding spaces.

Although he outranked his sister with a good 3 years, Jon was probably the smallest 16-year old boy that he knew. The doctors had said he suffered from Intrauterine Growth Restriction (or IUGR), which basically meant he was a semi-midget. The not entirely good, but also not as bad news, was that he suffered from a very, very mild case of IUGR, resulting that he was only smallish in structure and didn't have to worry about becoming a dwarf. However, it also meant his much younger sister outsized him significantly and often overpowered him in order to force him to come play her stupid little games.

Still, Jon often reflected, being small had its perks. In the world of Hide-and-Seek he was without equal. He could easily squeeze himself into any nook and cranny, and make himself disappear from the face of existence. Well at least until his frustrated friends declared that they gave up on the game.

Now as Jon surveyed the room interior, he quickly singled down the best hiding spots. The cabinet? No far too obvious. The closet? Oh heck no; that was the first place villains went to look for their quarry! Under the bed? Pffft. Hiding under the bed had been outmoded since the stone ages; no chance there-

Jon's train of thoughts was suddenly derailed by Cindy knocking on the bedroom-door: "JOOON! I know you're in there! And I'm a coming in! So brace yourself little piggy for the big bad wolf!" she giggled.

Yeah, she pretty much was a merciless wolf! Jon thought bitterly. With his options now few and far between, and his hourglass empty, Jon opted for the first hiding place he could get his feet in before Cindy came to take him away like the boogey-man.

He chose his mother's shoe closet, and skimmed across the room to find safe haven from his sister in its confines. And without a moment to spare, Jon closed the closet lid, just as the bedroom-door burst open; very much the same way as the cinema monster would brake open the haunted shack's portal to come get the hapless actors. (Author:Or maybe I should just stop using Hollywood analogies?)

Jon trembled as Cindy stalked the room, searching for her brother like a bloodhound: "Why won't you come play with me, Jon? You know you can't hide forever! You need to come eat sooner or later. I'll be waiting..."
Yeah, I think I'd rather starve. Jon thought snortingly

"Is he in here?" she opened the cabinet. "Or maybe under the bed? BOO! No?" Jon could hear her scurrying about in the room as she searched randomly for him.

"Jon? Are you still here? Where'd he go?" Cindy grumbled.

Several minutes passed, and Jon was just about gaining confidence that she would leave him in peace, when WHAM, the shoe-closet was ripped open and Cindy's leering truimphant smile stared at you: "Found you!" and she shoved a doll into Jon's hands - the very object and reason Jon had been trying to avoid his sister like the plague.

"No don't!" he begged, cringing into the corner; and tried to keep the doll away from himself with his outstretched palms. Them remembering that to touch the doll was to unleash its power, he quickly retracted his hands.

Too late.

With Jon in contact with the doll, he started transforming, taking places with it, trading forms. Jon was horrified that Cindy had chosen a particularly girly one this time. Ah snap.

=======

Jon and Cindy was the children of Mark Tyrell - a multi-billionaire corporate head of a massive world oil-industry conglomerate.
They grew up quite wealthy and lived in a secluded mansion. Often for days their father would leave on business trips, meaning that the two would fend for themselves (although they did have the aid of numerous butlers and maids to cater their every needs).

And each time their father left, Jon was at the mercy of his vindictive sister. She would force him to play her games, to attend her little tea-parties, making him cross-dress. She was the very embodiment of the rich girl, the spoiled brat that refused to take no for an answer. And she used to getting what she wanted. Being as little as he was, Jon could do little to resist his sister.

Then a month ago, things took a turn for the worse. Cindy had found some kind of magical doll, where she got it, how she got it, she refused to tell. But whomever touched it, traded places with it for 24 hours. Cindy now had a tool to constantly turn Jon into one of her girl friends. And since she was the only one who knew how it worked; as well as how to make Jon return to his old self, he had to comply with everything she told him to do.

Jon only knew that Cindy had found a new way to torture him.

=======

"Some more tea, Joani?" Cindy asked. Oh yeah, almost forgot. Cindy had this stupid habit of calling Jon by his girl name, refusing to let up regardless of how much he complained.

Jon just grumbled a reply, as Cindy served him, smiling brightly she poured him imaginary tea with the plastic jug.

Jon had pink wavy shoulder length hair, hooped earrings and wore a purple flowerdress. There was a blue star on one of his cheeks and his eyelashes was insanely long. Jon despised the way Cindy always customized the stupid magic-doll before making him switch places with it. He always ended up looking like some lucrative over-designed Saturday cartoon chick. Ugh.

"You should smile more, Joani." Cindy admonished as she pulled out a lengthy piece of paper: "I have a full schedule planned for the day."

What happens next?
13.title: Spoiled Brat.

choices: She can alter him & the doll in anyway shape or form
They are going out so it's Dress up time
132.title: Cindy has a special surprise in store for Jon.

info.brief_description: You find a magical doll that when used causes you and the doll to exchange forms.
info.description:
You find a magical doll that when used causes you and the doll to exchange forms. The exchange is form only. You do not become a doll, but the life size equivalent of whatever the doll is, clothes and all if the doll is wearing clothes. For example if the doll were a Barbie doll you would become a full size real life Barbie. The doll conversely adopts your former form, but will remain a normal nonliving doll. You’re stuck this way for 24 hours at which time you can use the doll to switch back. Keep a tight hold of the doll till you’re able to switch back because if someone else uses it they will get your old body and be stuck with it for 24 hours. Then again if you want someone else’s body you can get them to use the doll first and then you use it to get their body.

Sex is ok but no guy on guy please
No death or vore
No shrinking or growing
NO DEADENDS
